import React, { Component } from 'react'; import { Segment, Container, Divider, Header } from 'semantic-ui-react'; import Layout from '../components/Layout'; class AboutPage extends Component { render() { return (
SCSE19-0299: Block-Chain Based Question Answering System
Project Details

This is an experimental system for School Of Computer Science & Engineereing (SCSE) Final Year Project titled SCSE19-0299. All users are to only post questions of past year papers. No posting of Assignments or Tutorial Questions is allowed. Fraudulent accounts will be removed from the system and banned from future use.

How To Post New Question

Access using "Create New Question" tab above. Each creation of new question requires 1 token.

) } } export default AboutPage;
